content.question: Choose a reason for your divorce
content.explanation: You must choose one of the following reasons (legally known as the 'facts') for your divorce.
content.separatedDetails: What if we lived together after we separated?
content.sameResidenceHeading: Living in the same residence while separated
content.sameResidenceSummary: You can still live in the same residence while separated, as long you’re not living together as a couple, for example, you don’t eat, sleep or cook together.
content.asACoupleHeading: Living together as a couple after separating
content.asACoupleSummary1: If you have lived together as a couple after separating, you can’t use the
content.asACoupleSummary2: facts if it was for more than 6 months, during or after the separation period. This can have been either in a single period or over several periods.
content.asACoupleSummary3: Any time you spent living as a couple doesn’t count towards the separation period, and you’ll need to make up any time you were together before you apply for a divorce.
content.2Years: Living together as a couple after separating
content.5Years: 2 years separation with consent, 5 years separation and desertion
content.chooseAReason: Choose one of the following reasons:
content.unreasonableBehaviourSummary: Your {{ divorceWho }} has behaved in such a way that you can’t reasonably be expected to live with them any more
content.unreasonableBehaviourWarning: You’ll be asked to provide examples of the behaviour. If you have lived together as a couple for a period or periods totalling more than 6 months since the most recent incident you rely on, the court may take that into account in its decision on whether to grant you a divorce.
content.adulterySummary1: Your {{ divorceWho }} has committed adultery with a
content.adulterySummary2: and you find it intolerable (unbearable) to live with them. Adultery can only be used if it was with a member of the opposite sex
content.adulteryWarning: You can still use this reason if you continued to live together as a married couple afterwards; eg you still ate, slept, and cooked together. However, this can only have been for up to 6 months after you found out about the adultery - you’ll have to choose another reason if it’s more.
content.2YearsSeparationSummary: Your {{ divorceWho }} agrees to a divorce and you’ve been separated for the past 2 years
content.2YearsSeparationWarning: The court will ask your {{ divorceWho }} if they agree to a divorce. If they don’t agree, your application will be rejected and you’ll need to choose another reason.
content.2YearsSeparationExclusion: if you’ve been separated for the 2 year period immediately before the divorce application, and your {{ divorceWho }} agrees to a divorce
content.5YearsSeparationSummary: You’ve been separated from your {{ divorceWho }} for the past 5 years
content.5YearsSeparationExclusion: if you’ve been separated for the 5 year period immediately before the divorce application
content.desertionSummary: Your {{ divorceWho }} abandoned you (left without your agreement) more than 2 years ago
content.desertionExclusion: if your {{ divorceWho }} abandoned you (left without your agreement) more than 2 years ago
content.noneApply: None of these apply to my situation
content.finalPossibilities: If you can’t use any of the above reasons, you may be able to get a legal separation or annul your marriage.
content.alternativelyInFuture: Alternatively, in future you may be able to use the following

content.question: Dewiswch reswm dros eich ysgariad
content.explanation: Rhaid i chi ddewis un o’r rhesymau canlynol dros eich ysgariad (a elwir yn gyfreithiol yn ‘ffeithiau’).
content.separatedDetails: Beth os ydym ni wedi byw gyda’n gilydd ar ôl i ni wahanu?
content.sameResidenceHeading: Byw yn yr un ty ac wedi gwahanu
content.sameResidenceSummary: Mae’n iawn i chi ddal i fyw yn yr un ty ar ôl gwahanu, cyn belled nad ydych yn byw efo’ch gilydd fel cwpl ac nad ydych, er enghraifft, yn bwyta, cysgu na choginio efo’ch gilydd.
content.asACoupleHeading: Byw efo’ch gilydd fel cwpl ar ôl gwahanu
content.asACoupleSummary1: Os ydych wedi byw gyda’ch gilydd fel cwpl ar ôl gwahanu gallwch ddefnyddio’r
content.asACoupleSummary2: ffeithiau os oedd hynny am fwy na 6 mis, yn ystod y cyfnod gwahanu neu ar ôl hynny. Mae hyn yn gallu bod yn un cyfnod, neu dros sawl cyfnod.
content.asACoupleSummary3: Nid yw unrhyw gyfnod y gwnaethoch ei dreulio fel cwpl yn cyfrif fel rhan o’r cyfnod gwahanu, a bydd angen ichi wneud iawn am unrhyw amser y buoch gyda’ch gilydd cyn ichi wneud cais am ysgariad.
content.2Years: Byw efo’ch gilydd fel cwpl ar ôl gwahanu
content.5Years: 2 flynedd ar wahân gyda chydsyniad, 5 mlynedd ar wahân a gadael
content.unreasonableBehaviourSummary: Mae eich {{ divorceWho }} wedi ymddwyn mewn ffordd lle nad oes disgwyl, yn rhesymol, i chi allu byw gydag ef/hi ddim mwy
content.unreasonableBehaviourWarning: Gofynnir ichi  ddarparu enghreifftiau o’u hymddygiad. Os ydych wedi byw gyda’ch gilydd fel cwpwl am gyfnod neu gyfnodau o fwy na 6 mis ers y digwyddiad diweddaraf yr ydych yn dibynnu arno, efallai y bydd y llys yn cymryd hynny i ystyriaeth wrth benderfynu a ddylid caniatáu ysgariad.
content.adulterySummary1: Mae eich {{ divorceWho }} wedi godinebu gyda
content.adulterySummary2: ac nid ydych yn gallu dioddef byw gydag ef/hi. Ni ellir defnyddio godineb yn rheswm ond yn achos rhywun nad yw o’r un rhyw
content.adulteryWarning: Gallwch ddefnyddio’r rheswm hwn o hyd os gwnaethoch barhau i fyw gyda’ch gilydd fel cwpl priod wedyn; hynny yw roeddech yn dal i gysgu, bwyta a choginio gyda’ch gilydd. Fodd bynnag, ni all hyn fod am fwy na 6 mis ar ôl ichi gael gwybod am y godineb - bydd yn rhaid ichi ddewis rheswm arall os oedd y cyfnod yn hwy na hynny.
content.2YearsSeparationHeading: Wedi gwahanu am 2 flynedd drwy gytundeb
content.2YearsSeparationSummary: Mae eich{{ divorceWho }} yn cytuno i ysgaru ac rydych wedi gwahanu ers 2 flynedd
content.2YearsSeparationWarning: Bydd y llys yn gofyn i’ch {{ divorceWho }} a yw’n cytuno i gael ysgariad. Os nad yw’n cytuno, bydd eich cais yn cael ei wrthod  a bydd angen ichi ddewis rheswm arall.
content.2YearsSeparationExclusion: Os ydych wedi gwahanu ers cyfnod o 2 flynedd yn union cyn y cais am ysgariad, a bod eich {{ divorceWho }} yn cytuno i ysgaru
content.5YearsSeparationSummary: Rydych wedi gwahanu oddi wrth eich {{ divorceWho }} ers 5 mlynedd
content.5YearsSeparationExclusion: Os ydych wedi gwahanu ers cyfnod o 5 mlynedd yn union cyn y cais am ysgariad
content.desertionSummary: Mae eich {{ divorceWho }} wedi eich gadael (heb i chi gytuno) ers mwy na 2 flynedd yn ôl
content.desertionExclusion: Os yw eich {{ divorceWho }} wedi eich gadael (heb i chi gytuno) ers mwy na 2 flynedd yn ôl
content.noneApply: Nid yw’r un o’r rhain yn berthnasol i fy sefyllfa
content.finalPossibilities: Os na allwch ddefnyddio unrhyw un o’r rhesymau uchod, efallai y bydd modd ichi gael legal separation or annul your marriage.
content.alternativelyInFuture: Fel arall, yn y dyfodol efallai y bydd modd ichi ddefnyddio’r canlynol
